'''Liyue Ichiban''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete ''[[Absolutely Unique Delicacy]].''

==Trivia==
*The name of this achievement is a reference to the Japanese manga series {{w|Chūka Ichiban!}} by Etsushi Ogawa.
